name: IIHT
overview:
IIHT Bangalore has been renowned and accepted as the pioneer in introducing International certifications of Industry Majors, and setting up standards & benchmarks in quality of training delivery on various I.T Technologies to India since 1999.

IIHT Bangalore can customise, design, develop and deliver training, tailor-made to the specific requirements of your employees either onsite or at our training facilities in India. The real benefit to you is the ideal combination of our quality training, integrated with workplace application at a radically lower cost, without compromising on the Quality. We provide complete solutions with measurable results to ensure individuals achieve the utmost learning experience from our training courses.

More Info- http://www.iiht.com/ Enroll today for courses like Cloud computing, Complaints Management, Network Fraud Management, Microsoft courses, CISCO courses.
